seo.title: Blue Banana Manchester | Professional Piercings & Alt Style
seo.description: Manchester's premier piercing studio in Arndale Centre. Expert body piercings with 4.9/5 rating. Walk-ins welcome. Alternative fashion & gothic lifestyle.

openGraph.title: Blue Banana Manchester - Professional Body Piercing Studio
openGraph.description: Manchester's trusted piercing destination with 4.9/5 rating from nearly 3,000 reviews. Located in Arndale Shopping Centre.

headline: Manchester's Most
Trusted Piercing Studio
hero.subheadline: Professional body and ear piercings in the heart of Manchester's Arndale Centre. Nearly 3,000 five-star reviews speak for themselves.
hero.imageAlt: Blue Banana Manchester piercing studio interior

portfolio.subtitle: From classic ear piercings to bold body modifications, see our precision work

sessions.subtitle: Professional piercings with premium jewelry and aftercare guidance
sessions.guarantee: All piercings include premium jewelry and comprehensive aftercare instructions

items.title: Professional Piercing
features: High-quality titanium and surgical steel jewelry

testimonials.quote: Got my nose pierced here last week and the service was spot on. Really clean studio and the piercer talked me through everything. Healing perfectly!
testimonials.author: Emma K.

testimonials.quote: Been coming here for years for all my piercings. Never had any issues and the jewelry selection is brilliant. Staff always remember me too which is nice.
testimonials.author: Jake M.

testimonials.quote: Nervous about getting my first ear piercing but they made me feel so comfortable. Quick and barely hurt at all. Will definitely be back for more!
testimonials.author: Chloe R.

paragraphs: Right in the bustling heart of Manchester's Arndale Centre, Blue Banana has been the go-to spot for anyone wanting to express their alternative side. We're not just about piercings - we're about helping people embrace their individuality in a safe, professional environment that actually gets it.

Our team combines serious piercing expertise with a genuine love for alternative culture. Whether you're getting your first lobe piercing or adding to an extensive collection, we treat every client with the same level of care and attention. That's how we've earned nearly 3,000 five-star reviews and become Manchester's most trusted piercing destination.
about.callout: Every piercing is performed with single-use, sterile equipment and premium jewelry that's built to last.
about.imageAlt: Blue Banana Manchester team member performing a professional piercing

items.question: Do I need to book an appointment?
items.answer: Nope! We welcome walk-ins throughout the day, though you might have a short wait during busy periods. If you want to guarantee a specific time, you can book ahead through our Instagram or give us a call.

items.question: What's included in the piercing price?
items.answer: Everything you need - the piercing itself, premium jewelry (titanium or surgical steel), aftercare solution, and detailed healing instructions. We don't do cheap jewelry that'll cause problems later.

items.question: How do I look after my new piercing?
items.answer: We'll give you a proper aftercare guide when you leave, but the basics are: keep it clean with saline solution, don't touch it with dirty hands, and avoid swimming pools for the first few weeks. Most importantly, come back if you have any concerns!

finalCta.headline: Ready to Get Pierced?
finalCta.subheadline: Visit us in the Arndale Centre today - no appointment needed

booking.modalDescription: Tell us what you're looking for and we'll get back to you within 24 hours to arrange your appointment.
booking.successMessage: We'll get back to you within 24 hours to confirm your appointment. Can't wait? Pop into our Arndale Centre studio for a walk-in piercing!
booking.depositDisclaimer: No deposit required - payment taken on the day of your piercing

contact.address: Arndale Shopping Centre Unit 48 Barbirolli Mall East, Manchester M4 3AQ, UK

footer.tagline: Manchester's alternative edge since day one
